entitymodel.title: Entity of an Open For Business Project Component
entitymodel.author: None

field.name: organizationPartyId
field.description: The internal organization Party that owns (or rather, is liable for) the account.

field.name: ownerPartyId
field.description: The customer or third party that owns the account.

field.name: fromDate
field.description: Describes when account will be valid. If null, valid immediately.

field.name: thruDate
field.description: Expiration date of the account. If null, will never expire.

field.name: actualBalance
field.description: Calculated as the sum of FinAccountTrans.amount

field.name: availableBalance
field.description: Calculated as actualBalance minus sum of outstanding FinAccountAuth.amount

view-entity.title: Financial Account and Role View Entity

field.name: orderItemSeqId
field.description: To be used along with orderId to point to an OrderItem that represents the purchase of a product to add money to the account.

entity.title: Financial Account Transaction Type Attribute Entity
Financial Account Type GL Account Entity

view-entity.title: Financial Account Transactio Sum
view-entity.description: View entity to help calculate total of financial account transactions by doing a query for the sum of all amounts on a range of transactionDates for a given finAccountId, finAccountTransTypeId

view-entity.title: Financial Account Authorization Sum
view-entity.description: View entity to help calculate total of financial account authorizations by doing a query for the sum of all amounts on a range of transactionDates for a given finAccountId. Note there is no auth type to consider here, but authorizations do have from and thru dates

field.name: productMaintTypeId
field.description: If productMaintSeqId is known can lookup using that and the FixedAsset.productId; for un-scheduled maintenance is filled in directly

field.name: productMaintSeqId
field.description: Optional, though should be filled in to determine upcoming maintenance for all scheduled maintenance

field.name: scheduleWorkEffortId
field.description: Has field for estimated/actual start and finish dates, etc

field.name: intervalUomId
field.description: UOM for intervalQuantity; if used intervalMeterTypeId is generally not used (ie one or the other); if a meter reading is done as well that is not tied to the interval it should be tracked in a FixedAssetMaintMeter record

field.name: intervalMeterTypeId
field.description: Meter Type for intervalQuantity; if used intervalUomId is generally not used (ie one or the other)

entity.title: Fixed Asset Standard Cost Type Entity
Fixed Asset Maintance And Order Entity
Invoice Item Type GL Account Entity

view-entity.title: View of AcctgTrans and Entries, for easier lookup and calculation
Sum of AcctgTransEntry entity amounts, grouped by glAccountId, productId, debitCreditFlag

entity.title: General Ledger Account Group Member Entity
General Ledger Account Group Type Entity

view-entity.title: View of GL Account and its History, for lookup and calculation
View of GL Account Organization and the GlAccount and class, for lookup and calculation

entity.title: General Ledger Budget Cross Reference Entity
Running tally of average cost
entity.description: Running tally of a product's average cost in a particular company

entity.title: Defines GL Accounts for Inventory Variance Reasons

view-entity.title: Billing Account Role and Address Entity
view-entity.description: Note that the ContactMech is not linked into this view and the PADDR is not optional, this way we naturally only get postal address entries

field.name: validFromDate
field.description: Not common in some parts of the world.

field.name: issueNumber
field.description: Single digit number on some Switch and Maestro cards

entity.title: Credit Card Type GL Account Entity

field.name: overrideGlAccountId
field.description: If filled in, payment is applied directly against this GL account

entity.title: Payment Method Type GL Account Entity
Maps PaymentTypes to GlAccountTypes, allowing user to configure payments and gl accounts
Simple Sales Tax Lookup Entity
entity.description: NOTE: this entity is deprecated by TaxAuthorityRateProduct

view-entity.title: For viewing balances of tax authority GL accounts
